CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells were fabricated with configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| TiO x |
| Al |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities refer to the materials used in the fabrication of bulk heterojunction solar cells. These materials include ITO (Indium Tin Oxide), PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate), polymer, PC71BM ([6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester), TiO x (Titanium Oxide), and Al (Aluminum).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC71BM |
| TiO x |

In this revised list, I have removed "polymer" and "Al" as they are too general and do not clearly refer to specific materials. The remaining entities are more specific and can be considered as "Material Name" entities.

"Polymer" is a broad category of materials, and without further specification, it is not clear which specific polymer is being referred to in this context. Similarly, "Al" could refer to any compound containing aluminum, so it is not a clear "Material Name" entity.

On the other hand, "ITO" refers to a specific material made of Indium Tin Oxide, "PEDOT : PSS" is a specific material made of Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate, "PC71BM" is a specific material made of [6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester, and "TiO x" is a specific material made of Titanium Oxide with a variable amount of oxygen. These entities are more specific and can be considered as "Material Name" entities.
